excerpt: The TMC4671 is a fully integrated servo controller, providing Field Oriented Control (FOC) for BLDC/PMSM and 2-phase stepper motors as well as DC motors and voice coils. All control functions are implemented in hardware. Integrated ADCs, position sensor interfaces, position interpolators, enable a fully functional servo controller for a wide range of servo applications.If you like to see a step by step guide on driving a linear stage with the TMC4671, please visit the blog post where one of Trinamic's Engineers explains in 3 posts how to set up your linear stage, how to tune the controller using the TMCL-IDE, and how to adapt the firmware to your own project.Quick Setup GuideSpecial Featuresclosed loop controlFOCposition modevelocity modedual encoder
